items.sentence: I\'ll do whatever I can to make things easier for you.
I\'ll tell Tom about that the next time I talk to him.
The operator told me to hang up and wait for a moment.
The teacher called the students in alphabetical order.
Tom will get himself killed if he\'s not more careful.
Tom wished that Mary would tell him where she\'d been.
Tom\'s family vacations in the mountains every summer.
Tom told me he wasn\'t going to be at school tomorrow.
I think that it\'s unlikely that Tom will get elected.
I was hoping Tom wouldn\'t ask me to help him do that.
